credit_line: Gift of Mrs. John A. Benton
title: Two Mouse Musicians
inscriptions: verso: on frame in marker: Jos [?]50; on frame, on sticker: RCW8; on backing four labels: [1st]: "THE MUSICIANS"/copy of/ORIGINAL DRAWING BY/Robert Cornell -/original coloring by/2/67 Joseph Cornell. [2nd]: "Of all of Robert's precious drawings/I like best the two mice violinists."/(Mother's letter of 10/29/65./(eight months after R's passing) [3rd]: on the outside of the envelope (back)/in caps, "CLOUDS." [4th]: Robert Cornell -
